Package com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.ipt

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ColorfulBatch
    A substitute for SpriteBatch that adds an additional attribute to store an extra color's worth of channels, used to modify the intensity and chromatic channels of a color by multiplication (calle the "tweak") while the primary color affects the color additively (just called the color, often drawn from Palette or generated with ColorTools).
    ColorfulSprite
    Holds the geometry, color, and texture information for drawing 2D sprites using ColorfulBatch.
    ColorTools
    Contains code for manipulating colors as int, packed float, and Color values in the IPT color space.
    Palette
    A palette of predefined colors as packed IPT floats, the kind ColorTools works with.
